Commentary: Mohammad Amir to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, back of a length outside off, punched away through point
Mohammad Amir to Russell, no run, back of a length on middle stump, blocked into the on side
Mohammad Amir to Russell, no run, back of a length, angling away from off stump, opens up Russell on the back-foot defensive and beats his outside edge
Mohammad Amir to Russell, FOUR, full now, following Russell's cleared front leg, and he manages to find swinging room to whip powerfully to the left of deep square leg
Mohammad Amir to Russell, no run, short, rising ball over off stump, Russell can't connect with the pull
Mohammad Amir to Russell, FOUR, length ball on off and middle. Russell looks to make room and carve over the covers, gets a thick edge instead that flies over the slips
Sohail Khan to Sharjeel Khan, no run, full, a bit of movement into Sharjeel to cramp him up. Looks to swipe into the leg side and only manages an inside-edge onto his pad
Sohail Khan to Sharjeel Khan, OUT, full, a bit of swing into middle stump. Clips it, times it well, but hits it uppishly and straight to midwicket
Wicket: ['Sharjeel Khan c Shahzaib Hasan b Sohail Khan 1 (3b 0x4 0x6) SR: 33.33']

Commentary: Sohail Khan to Haddin, no run, fullish outside off, blocked to short cover
Sohail Khan to Haddin, FOUR, full on off stump and that's a typical Haddin shot. Clears his front leg to free some room for his arms, and swings freely through the line to drill it wide of mid-off
Sohail Khan to Haddin, no run, back of a length in the corridor, a bit of outswing, beats Haddin's attempted late dab
Sohail Khan to Haddin, no run, length ball on off stump, driven on the up but straight to mid-off this time
Mohammad Amir to Russell, no run, bouner, Russell ducks under it
Mohammad Amir to Russell, no run, another bouncer, Russell shapes to hook but it's too quick for him, forcing himself to duck again
Mohammad Amir to Russell, SIX, full on off stump and that is right in Russell's slot. Get his front leg out of the way and launches it over mid-off, such a clean hit

Mohammad Amir to Russell, no run, another bouncer, and Russell falls to the floor as he ducks hurriedly under it. This didn't get up as high and isn't officially a bouncer - ie, not above shoulder height
Mohammad Amir to Russell, no run, another bouncer, Russell has a swing at it this time, attempting a hook, and can't put bat to ball. Too quick for him, and he's taken his eyes off the ball

Mohammad Amir to Russell, OUT, yorker outside off, and Russell is out hit-wicket! Was going deep in his crease, possibly as a reaction to all those bouncers, and ended up smashing his own stumps he looked to jam his bat down on the ball
Sohail Khan to Haddin, no run, slower ball on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Wicket: ['AD Russell hit wicket b Mohammad Amir 14 (11b 2x4 1x6) SR: 127.27']

Commentary: Sohail Khan to Haddin, OUT, oh my. That's a short ball on off stump, only rising to waist height, and Haddin could have pulled it anywhere. He's picked out midwicket instead, and Islamabad are stumbling here. Excellent catch. Timed the leap perfectly and took it with both hands over his head
Sohail Khan to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, length ball, a bit of movement in towards off stump, gets forward for a perfect forward defensive into the covers
Sohail Khan to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, back of a length outside off, poked towards point
Wicket: ['BJ Haddin c Shakib Al Hasan b Sohail Khan 4 (6b 1x4 0x6) SR: 66.66']

Commentary: Sohail Khan to Misbah-ul-Haq, FOUR, back of a length outside off, steered to third man, looking for the single, and Amir fumbles, a bit of awkward bounce as he bent down to field it, and the ball slips past him and into the boundary
Sohail Khan to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, back of a length outside off, blocked towards backward point
Mohammad Amir to Khalid Latif, no run, length ball angling away from off stump, and it beats Latif's uncertain poke
Mohammad Amir to Khalid Latif, no run, back of a length on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
Mohammad Amir to Khalid Latif, no run, length ball close to off stump, blocked into the covers
Mohammad Amir to Khalid Latif, no run, beauty. Shifts his line a bit wider and beats the outside edge, as Latif fails to get his front shoulder around and his front foot across in time
Mohammad Amir to Khalid Latif, no run, wider and fuller and a big appeal for caught behind. Chased away from his body and missed. The sound was bat hitting ground
Mohammad Amir to Khalid Latif, no run, back of a length on off stump, jabbed to backward point
Sohail Khan to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, back of a length outside off, steered to third man
Sohail Khan to Khalid Latif, no run, length ball outside off, poked to cover point
Sohail Khan to Khalid Latif, no run, length ball on off stump, not much footwork from Latif, blocks it back to the bowler, playing from the crease
Sohail Khan to Khalid Latif, SIX, fullish outside off, gives him a bit of swinging room, and he just stands there, stands still, and swings through the line to launch it over mid-on
Sohail Khan to Khalid Latif, no run, length ball outside off, slapped to cover point
Sohail Khan to Khalid Latif, 2 runs, short outside off, pulled away to the right of midwicket and the left of deep backward square leg
Mir Hamza to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, back of a length outside off, dabbed to third man
Mir Hamza to Khalid Latif, no run, back of a length on off stump, punched to the right of short extra cover, who moves quickly to cut off the single
Mir Hamza to Khalid Latif, no run, shorter now, hits him on the body as he shuffles across and looks to work it through square leg
Mir Hamza to Khalid Latif, SIX, short ball outside leg, and Latif has just helped it on its way for six. Steps across and whips it away to the right of that man at deep backward square leg
Mir Hamza to Khalid Latif, 1 run, length ball on off stump, lets it come on for the push to deep point
Mir Hamza to Misbah-ul-Haq, 2 runs, back of a length on off stump. Takes a big step across and works it into the square leg region
Usama Mir to Khalid Latif, FOUR, tossed up outside off and Latif launches it over the covers, doesn't really middle it, but gets it into the gap between sweeper cover and long-off
Usama Mir to Khalid Latif, 1 run, back of a length outside off, punched to the right of backward point
Usama Mir to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, back of a length on middle stump. Misbah goes deep in his crease to tuck it away through square leg
Usama Mir to Khalid Latif, 1 run, quicker ball on middle and leg. Catches Latif on the crease, but he jams his bat down and squeezes it into the square leg region

Usama Mir to Misbah-ul-Haq, FOUR, back of a length close to off stump and Misbah exploits the field. There's no one in the third man region - just a slip - and he reverse-slaps it away, with the turn, and picks up four
Usama Mir to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, tossed up full on off stump, blocked into the covers
Shakib Al Hasan to Khalid Latif, no run, tossed up outside off, presses forward and defends into the off side
Shakib Al Hasan to Khalid Latif, no run, shorter now, slapped into the covers
Shakib Al Hasan to Khalid Latif, SIX, flighted ball outside off, and again Latif spots the swinging room and used it to launch cleanly over the long-on boundary
Shakib Al Hasan to Khalid Latif, 1 run, back of a length, sliding on towards off stump. Steps back and across and nudges it into the midwicket region
Shakib Al Hasan to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run
Shakib Al Hasan to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, back of a length, slapped away to sweeper cover
Usama Mir to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, full on leg stump, clipped through square leg
Usama Mir to Khalid Latif, no run, tossed up on off stump, blocked into the off side
Usama Mir to Khalid Latif, 1 run, full on off stump, driven to long-off
Usama Mir to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, flighted ball outside off, presses forward for a checked drive to long-off
Usama Mir to Khalid Latif, 1 run, length ball on middle stump, gets forward, slightly inside the line, for a checked push to the left of extra cover
Usama Mir to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, beauty. A bit of loop draws Misbah forward for a push into the covers, and it dips and turns past his outside edge
Shakib Al Hasan to Khalid Latif, no run, tossed up, slides on with the arm towards off stump, blocked into the covers
Shakib Al Hasan to Khalid Latif, no run, a bit shorter, goes back and pushes into the covers
Shakib Al Hasan to Khalid Latif, 1 run, flighted ball outside off, driven to long-off
Shakib Al Hasan to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, stays back to a fullish, flat ball angling into off stump, blocked back to the bowler
Shakib Al Hasan to Misbah-ul-Haq, FOUR, short, a bit of width, and it's easily put away, Misbah rocks back and cuts to the left of backward point
Shakib Al Hasan to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, full on off stump, whipped away through square leg
Usama Mir to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 leg bye, full, angling down leg, looks to flick but can only get some pad on it down to short fine leg

Usama Mir to Khalid Latif, no run, length ball close to off stump, pushes gently to the right of backward point. Sends Misbah back after he hurtles out of his crease. A direct hit at the bowler's end could have had Misbah in trouble
Usama Mir to Khalid Latif, 1 run, length ball on off stump, pushed gently to the left of extra cover
Usama Mir to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, full outside off, driven to long-off
Usama Mir to Khalid Latif, no run, full on middle stump, pushed back to the bowler
Usama Mir to Khalid Latif, no run, quickish length ball on middle and off, gets forward and defends with soft hands
Bopara to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, steps out of his crease and across his stumps. Bopara bowls it shortish outside off and he pokes it to backward point
Bopara to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, keeps a bit low outside off, sneaks under Misbah's attempted cut
Bopara to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, fullish outside off. Misbah shuffles across and clips to long-on
Bopara to Khalid Latif, 1 run, short and wide and he gets on his toes to slap it powerfully to sweeper cover
Bopara to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, back of a length outside off. Shuffles across and works it through midwicket
Bopara to Khalid Latif, no run, shortish outside off, skids past Latif's attempted cut
Usama Mir to Misbah-ul-Haq, FOUR, tossed up on middle and leg and he stretches out for a powerful sweep to long leg
Usama Mir to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, sees Misbah shaping to reverse sweep and fires it in full outside leg. Manages to reach out and play it to backward point
Usama Mir to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, on the pads, nudged away into the square leg region

Usama Mir to Khalid Latif, OUT, down the track and that isn't a great shot from Latif. But it's cleverly bowled by Usama, a quicker legbreak that lands shorter than Latif expects, and rips away to beat his slog. Mushfiqur has the bails off in a flash
Usama Mir to Asif Ali, no run, tossed up on middle stump, whipped to midwicket
Usama Mir to Asif Ali, 1 run, back of a length on off stump, gets on the back foot for a push to the left of extra cover
Sohail Khan to Asif Ali, 1 run, full on middle stump, a bit of swing in, whipped to long-on
Wicket: ['Khalid Latif st †Mushfiqur Rahim b Usama Mir 33 (35b 1x4 3x6) SR: 94.28']

Commentary: Sohail Khan to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, back of a length this time and he steps across to tuck it off his hips through square leg
Sohail Khan to Asif Ali, 2 runs, length ball outside off, heaved to the right of long-on
Sohail Khan to Asif Ali, 1 run, short outside off, pulled to long-on
Sohail Khan to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, back of a length on off stump, a bit of shape in, blocked to midwicket
Sohail Khan to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, back of a length outside off, chopped to backward point
Bopara to Asif Ali, FOUR, slower ball wide outside off, and Asif swipes it in the air and just beats long-on sprinting desperately to his right and diving
Bopara to Asif Ali, 1 run, yorker, looks to whip it away and gets an inside edge that hits the pad and rolls into the fine leg region
Bopara to Misbah-ul-Haq, 2 runs, full and wide, steered to the right of the backward point fielder
Bopara to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, slower ball outside off, poked gently towards point for the quick single
Bopara to Asif Ali, no run, slower ball outside off, Asif slogs and misses
Bopara to Asif Ali, no run, again. Slower ball wide of off, Asif hoicks and misses
Mohammad Amir to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, quick short ball on off stump, blocked back to the bowler

Mohammad Amir to Misbah-ul-Haq, FOUR, full on middle stump, looks for the yorker. Misbah goes deep in his crease to whip it away, gets an inside edge that runs away between his legs and into the fine leg boundary
Mohammad Amir to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, back of a length outside off, dabbed to backward point
Mohammad Amir to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, fullish, angling into middle and off. Shuffes across to nurdle into the midwicket region
Mohammad Amir to Asif Ali, 1 run, full on off stump, whipped to deep midwicket
Mohammad Amir to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, bouncer, Misbah ducks his upper body under it
Bopara to Asif Ali, 1 run, back of a length on middle and leg, stays inside the line for the push through cover

Bopara to Misbah-ul-Haq, OUT, down the track now and Bopara bowls a slower ball wide of off stump. Misbah goes through with the big hit, seems to make a good connection, but he gets more elevation and less distance than desired, and the ball swirls around in the air before dropping down into long-on's hands
Bopara to Asif Ali, 4 leg byes, full, angling down leg, and Asif can't connect with the flick but the ball clips his back leg and runs away to the fine leg boundary
Bopara to Asif Ali, SIX, slower ball outside off, and that's a super strike from Asif. Held his shape very well and swung freely through the line and easily cleared the fielder back at long-off
Bopara to Asif Ali, 1 run, length ball outside off, leans back while looking to flat-bat through cover, and ends up miscuing it, on the bounce towards long-off
Bopara to Azhar Mahmood, 1 run, low full-toss outside off, lets it come on and squeezes it down to third man
Mir Hamza to Azhar Mahmood, no run, short outside off, slapped to backward point
Mir Hamza to Azhar Mahmood, 1 run, back of a length on middle and leg, clears his front leg and swats it away to deep square leg

Mir Hamza to Asif Ali, SIX, full, angling into off stump, and that's another clean strike, goes deep in his crease with his back leg, clears his front leg, and swivels through his hips to launch over wide long-on
Mir Hamza to Asif Ali, no run, bouncer, Asif ducks under it

Mir Hamza to Asif Ali, SIX, bish, bash, boom. Short ball angling into off stump, and Asif has finished with a six. Steps across, swivels, and pulls it away, high over the square leg umpire. Superb timing, and a crucial innings to close this game
